website_summaries.verdict: An infusion of cinnamon, Himalayan salt, and chia seeds takes this butter up a notch.
pros: Many buyers praise the pleasantly crunchy texture of Betsy's Best – largely thanks to the chia seeds
The cinnamon also adds a layer of flavor
Plus, this butter even comes with recipes
cons: Some say the cinnamon flavor overpowers the sunflower seed

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing.. I am allergic to all nuts
customer_reviews.text: Oh my flipping goodness.... This is amazing.. I am allergic to all nuts.. to practically everything...but I haven't always been. As a child I enjoyed PB&J then when I became a teen. I had become allergic to peanuts.😭😭 So bye bye PB&J. I am recently trying to eat healthier and learn about alternative foods to eat.. I came across this and decided to try... It didn't let me down.. I had this with brown rice cakes.. zadoooks!!! It was delish.. this is a must try..
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alicea

customer_reviews.title: More Cinnamon Spread than Sunflower Seed Butter
customer_reviews.text: Tasty cinnamon butter that doesn't really taste like sunflower seeds the way plain sunbutter does, so don't let that disappoint you if that's what you're hoping for. The flavor is a bit sweet (but not overly sweet; I don't have a big sweet tooth) and it's very cinnamony. Note that the label reads "Gourmet Seed Butter," so it doesn't match the photo on product page here on Amazon, which reads "Cinnamon Seed Butter." (I was worried they'd sent the wrong product when I first received it.)
customer_reviews.author: Raw Smell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on the stevia.
customer_reviews.text: It sounded so good but it has SO much of that stevia aftertaste!! I was not expecting it to be so sweet...ish... I just really don’t like the blatant stevia taste. I am mixing it with another nut butter I have to use it since I already paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara F. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other buttery spreads from Betsy's Best, the Peanut Butter remains my favorite. Although the Sunflower is a bit over powering to my liking, it's do to the fact that I was never a big fan of Sunflower seeds to begin with. I purchased ALL of Betsy's Best products because I do enjoy the PB and ALMOND Spread. This company delivers prompt and satisfying service, I would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 5 stars because it is delicious and toddler-approved. I’m bummed out, though, that the product title did not indicate that it was cinnamon flavored. Upon second glance, I do see the Cinnamon indicated in the picture, but it’s not in every picture you scroll through. I was hoping for a more direct substitute for PB, the cinnamon does make this one a tad sweeter. But it is delish, and we do plan to eat it all without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a full 16 ounce jar.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but I received a jar that was about 2/3 full. No way was it 16 ounces. Also there are 2 tablespoons in 1 ounce. The serving size is 2 tablespoons and there are 14 servings. That’s 14 ounces not 16. The jar I received easily fit inside a 16 ounce measuring cup. I would like an explanation from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: Stop whatever you are doing and snag a jar of @betsysbest right now. It was love at first taste for the Smith crew! I love the Cinnamon Seed Butter for a quick healthy snack for me, an after preschool snack for the boys, or a sweet treat! The texture is amazing and it tastes divine. Was the perfect on the go breakfast for me this AM when trying to get the crew out of the door for a 9am soccer game!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly delicious and rather addictive. Easier to stir and mix than most natural nut butters. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This spread is different from other nut spreads because of the mixture of flavors. It is delicious and I really enjoy eating it - almost like desert. I was planning to order sunflower butter and saw this and gave it a try. So glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nosal

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in a pork curry with excellent results. The flavor is great and provided a real unusual taste treet. I’ve used peanut butter previously, but not having to worry about peanut allergies was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: James m

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH CINNAMON FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Had approximately 1/2 teaspoon in my morning protein smoothie before training. Was significantly too much cinnamon for me and made me nauseous for hours to the point I almost threw up during my workout. Maybe it works for others but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: KnoxvilleSpartan

customer_reviews.title: So delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Creamy delicious spread- good on crackers or muffin or pancakes - also good on apple slices and bananas - so nutritious and delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It's sweetened though and I didn't expect or want that. Also you get two jars and I thought I was getting one.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for nut allergies. Cinnamon overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Cinnamon taste is overwhelming. Not safe for nut allergies. I wanted it for my son with allergies but he can’t have it. It is processed where they process nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love texture!
customer_reviews.text: Recently both Cinnamon Sunflower Seed Butter to try something new with a different flavor. Sunflower seed Butter is really tasty, love the crunchy texture but I couldn’t taste no Cinnamon flavor. I also live the fact that is to very sweet. I love eating with avocado and honey.
customer_reviews.author: Trend Me Up - Eveline R

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seed butter! Not only does it taste delicious (we put it on a rice cake), but the ingredients are top notch and great for the body!
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this sunflower butter! Cinnamon, Himalayan salt, just a bit of sugar. Nice alternative to peanut Butter & almond butter, which I can't have. Would even be better with half the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best After-Work Snack
customer_reviews.text: I truly love the taste of this butter. The balance of the cinnamon and light sweetness of honey pairs really well with other fruit. I usually eat this after work with a spoon or with pretzels. I'll definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Sunflower Seeds-High in Estrogen
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great but I would caution anyone trying to avoid estrogen as sunflower seeds will spike estrogen
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Very odd
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but, it was too much of a good thing. The chia seeds just didn't work in the mix for me. Strange combo that sounded interesting but just wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and taste.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a really good product. I just can’t get past the consistency. I’m going to try it in a few other things like baking!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Reese

customer_reviews.title: Too much salt
customer_reviews.text: This product would be good except for the overabundance of the salt in it. The overly salty taste messes it up. Jan De Pre
customer_reviews.author: Jan De Pre

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! I was thoroughly impressed. Thanks!! Will definitely try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: TASTLESS
customer_reviews.text: CLUMP AND OIL...NOT BLENDABLE AT ALL AND ANY TASTE AT ALL WAS AWFUL!
customer_reviews.author: connie peebles

customer_reviews.title: Bad after taste
customer_reviews.text: This product has a terrible chemical after taste from the artificial sweetner I didn’t see that on the ingredients list and it can’t be returned which is really annoying. I won’t be eating this.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Utal

customer_reviews.title: Stevia Flavor
customer_reviews.text: You can taste the stevia in this nut butter, which I'm not a huge fan of - otherwise great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: TreeSoul

customer_reviews.title: but my daughter liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Not too wild about the taste, but my daughter liked it.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Yummylicious
customer_reviews.text: Gourmet cinnamon sunflower seed is great on breakfast toast, the chia seeds add a nice crunch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy to my tummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smeared on apple slices. Yum! Yum! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly delicious butter from a first class seller. Will absolutely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: JerryL

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with taste and texture, and this exceeded my expectations. I love the cinnamon taste and the chia seeds add a nice texture. I can't believe this is sunflower butter, it tastes SO good!!
customer_reviews.author: GINA

customer_reviews.title: interesting flavor
customer_reviews.text: product will take a little time to acquire a taste for it
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: ... to the other flavors but it is still quite good. Have recommended to others to try
customer_reviews.text: Cinnamon flavor is a bit strong compared to the other flavors but it is still quite good. Have recommended to others to try.
customer_reviews.author: Krayz Rebel

customer_reviews.title: A delicious staple in our home
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunbutter, and reorder regularly. Great taste and texture, and the company has been great about shipping and helping with any problems. The flavor is great! Thank you for making such a great treat!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Yuck... only tried it once. Once was enough
customer_reviews.text: With prime I had good delivery of this product. But it just doesn’t taste great to me. The cinnamon might have been what completely killed the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: mikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting
customer_reviews.text: This nut butter is delicious. The chia seeds really add a nice crunch to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nummy
customer_reviews.text: It tastes pretty good. Made my mouth happy. I like a happy mouth!
customer_reviews.author: ral6767

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, truly
customer_reviews.text: The taste is delicious. I sometimes get the seeds in my teeth but who cares. I have purchased this jar more then once for myself and have also gifted it to a friend. I really enjoy this as just a spoonful or on a sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla G

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: This sunflower butter is better than I thought. The kick of cinnamon was definitely a great move in this. I will purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Renee Palma

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so yummy! A little thicker than I anticipated but totally worthy to eat it by the spoonful. The cinnamon flavor is sooo perfect. I add a spoonful to my superfood chocolate shakes as well. Perfect for a sweet tooth craving without the guilt!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: With all the ingredients listed I expected great flavor, instead flat taste with a hint of salt. So many other, more affordable brands to choose from with much better flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ep

customer_reviews.title: Added sugar
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed in the added sugar. Could have been so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This sunflower butter is delicious. I think I'll try the other flavors soon!
customer_reviews.author: dgarcia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended at all. Disgusting taste and horrible aftertaste... save your money...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: This gave me a stomachache both times I tried it. Tried to return it and Amazon said it was ineligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: AV Innovative Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious. I used it on toast and mixed it with plain yogurt. Please bring it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Harder

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to come out.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the flavor, it looks like chocolate in the middle of the jar and sticky, have to mix it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Taste is beyond disgusting. And now I am stuck with an $11 jar or gross gloop that I wasted my money on. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: The Best Un-peanut Butter! :)
customer_reviews.text: Tastes wonderful - slightly sweet, and obviously cinnamon. It's an Upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: SJY98053

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This product may be good it but it arrived with The seal broken and oil was in the box. I would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: clif

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was unique and amazing, perfect on whole wheat toast! My new morning "go to"!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So delicious!! I'm ordering more now. I'm going to see what else Betsy has to offer - YUM!
customer_reviews.author: cassandra bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Deliciously salty sweet with a little crunch. One bite is not enough!
customer_reviews.author: Marie P Hunniecutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best tasting Sunflower Seed Butter! I'm addicted to this stuff--wonderfully delicious and super healthy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie_G

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. I love the sweet cinnamon taste. It's a step up from plain old sunflower butter.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was a good product . It could maybe a little less thick.
customer_reviews.author: amy barnes

customer_reviews.title: Contains Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the ingredients carefully. I like the chia seeds in it. I was looking for plain sunflower seed butter. I eat it when I want something sweet. Two teaspoons are about right for me. When I finish this jar I will try again to find plain sunflower butter and see if I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Most disgusting seed butter I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Most disgusting seed butter I have ever had. I am so sad I wasted my money and am not able to return :(
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Pace

customer_reviews.title: half full
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 jars which came separately. One was fine and tastes great. The other one was only half full. It doesn't appear to be opened or leaking. I'm not sure what the problem is. It's very unfortunate because I like the one that was full, but I'm too scared to eat the half full one.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

product_meta.title: Gourmet Cinnamon Sunflower Seed Butter w/Chia Seeds by Betsy's Best - All Natural and GMO Free
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Cinnamon| Size:1 Pound (Pack of 1)Tired of the bland options available in your grocery store and Amazon?
Make healthy eating tasty and exciting with Betsy's Best Gourmet Cinnamon Seed Butter! We combine all-natural, flavorful superfood ingredients including sunflower and chia seeds, cinnamon, organic honey, and Himalayan pink salt to make a unique spread unlike anything else you will find on Amazon! The recipe has been carefully crafted by Betsy's Best founder, Betsy Opyt. She is a personal trainer, registered dietician and was awarded 2015's Young Mother of the Year by the Florida Chapter of the American Mothers Association. She designed her nut and seed butters so that her child would be excited about healthy eating. You and your kids will be saying “It was love at first taste!”

Our gourmet seed butter's ingredients are:

> Sunflower Seeds 
> Chia seeds 
>Organic honey
>Cinnamon
>Pink Himalayan Salt
>100% Organic Stevia Leaf Extract 

We only use THE BEST INGREDIENTS because healthy eating is important to us and we know it is important to you too. One serving contains only 4 grams of sugar! Our sweet and salty seed butter makes any recipe better! 

Betsy's Best will be the star of any recipe:

*Smoothies
*Apple Slices
*Dark Chocolate
*Muffins
*Seed Butter Sandwiches
*Cookies
*AND SO MUCH MORE!
Our bold flavors, fresh ingredients, and unique textures don't get lost in the recipe like cheap nut butter does. Give your favorite foods and new kick with Betsy's Best! 

We stand behind a product and ensure complete customer satisfaction. We want you to think this is the best seed butter you've tried. If you aren't giddy with excitement for every bite. If your kids aren't asking for more before the jar is empty. If you aren't head over heels in love with our product, you have every right to a complete and prompt refund.
Click "ADD TO CART" and get the best seed butter around delivered to you in two days!
feature_bullets: Unique Gourmet Flavor -- You won't find anything else like Betsy's Best Cinnamon Seed Butter on Amazon. We have carefully crafted our recipe to maximize taste and all-natural nutrition. Loaded with flavorful and nutrient rich superfood ingredients including sunflower seeds, chia seeds, cinnamon, Himalayan pink salt, and organic honey, it will be love at first taste!

Kids Love It -- Getting children to eat healthily can be a challenge. Betsy's Best Cinnamon Sunflower Seed Butter can be put on celery, apple slices, whole grain muffins, mixed into smoothies and so much more. Your children will love the taste of our seed butter and you’ll love its wholesome nutrition! Sunflower seeds are packed with fiber, protein, essential nutrients and healthy fats! With so many schools banning peanuts, why not make the switch to sunflower seed butter and jelly sandwiche

Great in Recipes – Betsy’s Best Cinnamon Seed Butter is a delicious gourmet add-in for your favorite recipes and is a great alternative to peanut butter. From smoothies and breakfast baked goods, to sandwiches, salad dressings and marinades, to cookies and as an ice cream topper, you will truly taste the difference when you use Betsy’s Best.

Low in Sugar – Despite its naturally sweet flavor, Betsy’s Best Cinnamon Sunflower Seed Butter has only 4 grams of sugar per serving. Betsy, a registered dietitian, uses a touch of three different all-natural sweeteners – organic honey, demerara sugar, and organic stevia leaf extract. With its sweet taste, but low sugar content Betsy’s Best makes the perfect substitute for high-sugar hazelnut spreads. Give it a try and taste the difference!

Best Taste Guarantee -- Betsy's Best Seed Butter is a unique and flavorful spread. We absolutely love it, but everyone has different tastes. That's why we offer you an exclusive 60 Day Money Back Guarantee. If you don't love every bite. If your kids aren't begging you to buy more. If you aren't desperately digging to get every last scrap out of the jar. If you don't LOVE this product as much as we do, we will issue you a full and prompt refund
